attributes.additional_details:
I wish to see The goverment change the law which at the moment favours newspapers which support the goverment of the day being reviewed on the BBC.
If the BBC DG has a policy in place which barrs the morning star then we might as well live in a country
Run a Dictator
This petition calls for a New Law that gives Fair coverage by the BBC rather than the views expressed by Chris Patten.

rejection.details: Government does not interfere with the day-to-day running of the BBC.
